questions.text: What word means 'lacking insight or discernment'?
Which word does not mean to equivocate?
What word means to give someone an enema?
What word describes the red-orange primordial muck that sprung life?
What word describes to work up into a ball of 'excitement'?
What word comes from the Seven against Thebes, and describes a 2nd rate thinker?
What kind of animal is swallowed by a Gobemouche, if the word is taken literally?
questions.explanation:
fly.

	The word literally means fly swallower.  Figuratively, it is applied to a naive person, easily duped - the image is of someone walking around, mouth agape, scarcely able to believe what they are seeing.

questions.text: Humans use the podials and metapodials to walk. What type of walking is this called?
What is another word for sebaceous cyst?
What action are you performing when you are raddling?
